messages.subject: Re: late night TV, was freedom vs. neglect
messages.msgSnippet: ... TV ... with the ... Actually, I find the true beauty of TIVO is that when the schedule changes, that darn box KNOWS it and records your favorite shows at
messages.messageBody:
> > Leslie in SC, who gets upset when they mess up the late night
TV
> >schedule!
> Maybe DVR/TiVO a couple favorites? That way if they do monkey
with the
> schedule, you can pop that on instead and have that nice familiar
> theme music and all.
----------------------------

Actually, I find the true beauty of TIVO is that when the schedule
changes, that darn box KNOWS it and records your favorite shows at
their newly scheduled times :) (assuming they are still on at all)

Kiersten
mom to Jacob 4 1/2 and Emma 3

who never wanted TIVO until we got it...
Commercials- what are those???

And for late night holding of Emma when she can't sleep- WOW, all
these GOOD shows are waiting for me:)

messages.subject: late night TV, was freedom vs. neglect
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/21/2006 8:13:48 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, ... (mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com) ,  Leslie530@..,  Le ... Maybe  DVR/TiVO a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/21/2006 8:13:48 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
soggyboysmom@... writes:



--- In _unschoolingbasics@unschoolingbuns_
(mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com) , Leslie530@.., Le
>
>
>
> Leslie in SC, who gets upset when they mess up the late night TV
>schedule!
Maybe DVR/TiVO a couple favorites? That way if they do monkey with the
schedule, you can pop that on instead and have that nice familiar
theme music and all.




***********

This reminds me of when my son was little, he had such a hard time going to
sleep and waking during the night. He also had night terrors of some sort.

I had collected hours of Little Bear on video to have handy during the day.
The calm music and sweet stories always helped calm him out of a tantrum.
One night, in desperation, I put in Little Bear and it worked like magic! He
relaxed and went to sleep.

I should probably dig those out and use them myself! :)

Leslie in SC (still without DVR)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
